title: Perform Soil Compaction Test
description: After a layer of fill has been placed for a new road, a field technician must test its compaction using a nuclear density gauge.

tasks.description: Retrieve the project specification for the required soil compaction level.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician finds the spec requires '95% of maximum dry density'.

tasks.description: Perform the test with the nuclear density gauge at a designated location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician operates the gauge to get a reading.

tasks.description: Log the test result in the quality system and verify that it meets the minimum requirement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the result of 96%, which passes the test, and approves the area for the next layer of fill.
